channel.title: Release on Plakar | The Open Standard for Backup and Restore
channel.description: Recent content in Release on Plakar | The Open Standard for Backup and Restore

item.title: Announcing Plakar Enterprise for AWS (Preview)
item.description: We are proud to announce the immediate availability of Plakar Enterprise for AWS, bringing Cloud-Native Resilience and Zero-Trust security to your VPC.

item.title: Release v1.0.6 — Bugfix and memory usage improvement
item.description: v1.0.6 brings a few bugfixes and huge memory usage improvements.

item.title: Release v1.0.5 — Refinements, Hooks & Build Improvements
item.description: v1.0.5 is here! This release focuses on build improvements, UI updates, smarter pipelines, new hook capabilities, and various maintenance enhancements.
